snippet: In a weak housing market, with banks more cautious about lending, the role of the appraiser has taken on more importance.
abstract: Home appraisers have taken on an ever more powerful role as banks become more cautious about mortgage lending; appraisers are now able to arbitrarily make or break a real estate deal, problem that has become so widespread that the National Association of Realtors has blamed faulty appraisals for holding back a national housing recovery.
lead_paragraph: In a weak housing market, with banks more cautious about lending, the role of the appraiser has taken on more importance.

headline.seo: Scrutiny for Home Appraisers as Market Struggles
headline.main: Scrutiny for Home Appraisers as the Market Struggles
